author: Heather Schofield
text:
Chesterfield County, Virginia is currently researching survey software to conduct citizen, business, customer and employee surveys.  We would like to purchase survey software that meets the following criteria:  
Security controls.
Internal and external survey capability.
Reporting capabilities that provide basic statistical analysis such a mean, mode, standard deviation, question ranking, percent favorable summary, category summary and basic filtering.  
Software that is intuitive and can meet the needs of the more experienced survey user as well as those that are less experienced in the field.
Electronic and Paper (scanning) capability, if cost effective.
If you are currently using survey software that you would recommend please respond with a recommendation to the following address:  SchofieldH@chesterfield.gov
title: Researching Survey Software
